reviewText: Mexican comedies are for the most part very graphic and by that I mean they feature a lot of female nudity. And sexist jokes. The women here are very pretty and they look good in the nude. If for some reason you are offended by this don'y buy it. The films are a bit old from the 1970s to the early 80s. But they transfer rather well on dvd. The picture quality is a bit hazy on the dark side but are very viewable. I got 8 movies for $8 so thats kind of a bargin, anything higher than that I would probably say no.
